oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Menu for American Expeditionary Forces reunion
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Colorful menu decorated with American Expeditionary Forces shoulder patches. An American Legion lapel button is affixed to the front cover. The 2nd AEF reunion and Captain's Farewell Dinner was held aboard the S.S. Republic. The menu featured boiled halibut, prime ribs of beef au jus, roast stuffed Philadelphia capon, green peas, potatoes, sliced tomatoes, ice cream, and chocolate cake. The menu belonged to Roscoe Howard, Btry. A, 13th Battn., Field Arty. Replacement Depot. He was from Henagar, AL.
